name: rutgers-virtual-flyer
description: * Work in groups of 3 * The goal is to create a fully functioning full stack app that shows your Rutgers pride * You will use Handlebars to generate HTML * You will use Sequelize to create data models for the database storage * You will use Express for routing * You will use Bootstrap (or Materialize) as a frontend CSS framework * You will use Passport for authentication * You will use jQuery for front end form validation
